Description
jchess

  • Classes in jchess used by jchess
    Class
    Description
    Chat
    Class representing the game chat Players are in touch and can write a messages to each other
    Chessboard
    Class to represent chessboard.
    Client
    Class responsible for clients references: for running game, for joing the game, adding moves
    Clock
    Class to represent seperate wall-clock for one player.
    Game
    Class responsible for the starts of new games, loading games, saving it, and for ending it.
    GameClock
    Class to representing the full game time
    JChessApp
    The main class of the application.
    Moves
    Class representing the players moves, it's also checking that the moves taken by player are correct.
    Player
    Class representing the player in the game
    Player.colors
     
    Player.playerTypes
     
    Server.connection_info
     
    Settings
    Class representings game settings available for the current player
    Settings.gameModes
     
    Settings.gameTypes
     
    Square
    Class to represent a chessboard square
